meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a monsignor.
meanings.sent1: The monsignorial robes were elegant and dignified.
meanings.sent2: The monsignorial duties included assisting the bishop.
meanings.sent3: The monsignorial hat was so big, it kept falling off his head!
meanings.sent4: Her monsignorial presence commanded respect in the church.
meanings.sent5: The monsignorial title added a sense of importance to his role.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the rank or office of a monsignor.
meanings.sent1: The monsignorial residence was located near the cathedral.
meanings.sent2: His monsignorial responsibilities involved overseeing parish affairs.
meanings.sent3: The monsignorial office was always filled with paperwork.
meanings.sent4: She carried herself with a monsignorial grace and authority.
meanings.sent5: The monsignorial insignia symbolized his position within the church.
